Description: Welcome to our NO RESERVE auction! You are bidding on a nice USA EVH left handed Wolfgang Stealth model electric guitar. Guitar features a basswood body with a 1/2" thick maple top, maple neck with graphite reinforcement rods, 22 fret ebony fingerboard, stainless frets, black hardware, EVH-branded Floyd Rose double locking tremolo bridge, EVH D-tuna, and EVH humbucker pickups. Comes with tremolo bar and G&G hard case. Condition:Guitar overall is in good shape. Top/neck is very clean. The frets have no wear to speak of. Back of guitar (on plastic covers) has buckle marks from playing. The sides of guitar have a few scratches (see pics) but no deep scratches/gouges/cracks. There is a mute/bypass switch install (switch on back, button on top of guitar) that I'm not sure was installed at the factory or aftermarket. Works as intended as do the guitar electronics. 25.5 in. scale and guitar weighs 8lbs 12ozs with tremolo bar on. This is a great looking/sounding instrument that you can play at home or on the road without worrying about playing marks. It is not a case queen but in very very good used condition in my opinion. Please email me with any questions or request for more pics. FREE shipping will either be via USPS Priority Mail or FedEx Ground depending on final weight of package and destination. (NO PO BOXES PLEASE) Payment is due within 3 days of auction ending.
Title: NICE! USA Left Handed EVH Wolfgang Stealth Black Electric Guitar With Case
